item.title: About
item.description: Key skills functional programming advocate Kotlin, Scala, Swift, Rust, C/C++, C#, Python Android, IOS, mobile architectures (MVI, MVRx, MVVM, MVP) Blog Handling search with RxJava2 and Kotlin (featured in kotlin weekly #55) Baby steps to reactive programming with Kotlin (featured in kotlin weekly #61) Career Android Architect October 2017 - Present Yoyo Wallet yoyowallet.com I have joined to architect the existing codebase for the android apps and teach the team for architecture, object-oriented and functional patterns.
